rule: Each description must be composed in a single, unbroken paragraph without any line breaks.
input: A sunny meadow with wildflowers swaying in the breeze, a solitary bench under a large willow tree, and butterflies fluttering around.
coverage: A serene sunny meadow bathed in warm daylight, featuring vibrant wildflowers in various colors gently swaying in the soft breeze. A solitary wooden bench is placed beneath the expansive branches of a large, graceful willow tree, its leaves cascading gracefully. Delicate butterflies flutter around, adding dynamic movement to the scene. The bright natural sunlight casts gentle, dappled shadows, enhancing the lush greenery of the background. The overall atmosphere evokes a peaceful, tranquil feeling, inviting viewers to experience calm and harmony with nature.
